segments.text: Let's skip The X-files tonight , Fran . Okay ? Just this once ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me guess . You want to watch the History Channel again !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How did you know ! There's a program on ancient Egypt tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I guess I could tape The X-files and watch it later ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mysteries of the Pyramids . Didn't we watch this program last week ?
segments.speaker: S2
